short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily test & view your JSON REST services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restplate is designed as a simple application to test JSON based REST services. With a fluid interface, multiple options for query strings, authentication & headers and a focus on the UI, Restplate strives to be an easy to use resource. Plus the fact that its responsive from mobile to desktop is really just a great bonus.
